verbose_text: In contrast, the cellular protein, PICT-1, can sequester the virally encoded apoptosis suppressor protein, KS-Bcl-2 protein, from the mitochondria into the nucleolus to downregulate its anti-apoptotic activity 56.
evidence: PICT-1, can sequester the virally encoded apoptosis suppressor protein, KS-Bcl-2 protein
